title: Covered Incense Burner
description: The globular body raised on a splayed foot with projecting animal mask and loose ring handles on either side of the rim, the globular body and domed cover pierced and carved with chrysanthemum and other floral scroll, the finial in the form of a coiled dragon surrounded by three reclining rams, the stone with brown rivering.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and Gift of the Thomas Barlow Walker Foundation
